page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE M.HAZELWOOD
page.content: I get up at 5.30am on Monday, Wednesday and Friday mornings to go to the pool for squad training.When I get back I get changed and play on my computer for a while.Next I get my lunch packed and my bike out.I start for school at 7-50 and get to Debbie's house at around 8-05.We stay for 10 to 15 minutes and call for Justine.We go to the shop and I buy something to eat on the way to school.At school we have a playtime 'till around 9-05.We go into assembly and reappear at 9-25. We go into the class room and read for 10 to 15 minutes.Next we either do Maths or English..At 10-30 we go out to break,this lasts for 15 minutes 'till 10-45.When we come in we sometimes carry on with Maths or Engish .At 12-00 it is dinner time Debbie and I go into second sitting at about 12-40.
